respective banks.

Supervisory Measures Adopted in Relation to 
On-site and Off-site Supervision
Following the initial COVID-19 outbreak, the timelines for 
addressing supervisory concerns by licensed banks were 
re-set by granting extended time periods for addressing 
supervisory  concerns  which  were  to  be  addressed  up 
to  31  May  2020  depending  on  the  severity.  Further, 
the deadline for submission of statutory returns to Bank 
Supervision  Department  was  extended  by  two  weeks, 
and the publication of quarterly financial statements was 
extended by one month.
